website_summaries.verdict: Give your get-togethers a touch of class with this simple 6-piece set.
pros: Decanter is heavy, durable, and dishwasher safe
Set includes 6 glasses, ideal size for entertaining guests
Pointed tip glass stopper is unique and effectively seals the decanter
cons: Wide, square decanter is a little harder to pour from

customer_reviews.title: Not cut crystal....sub -par
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but it is not appear to be 100% "crystal"...it just doesn't reflect the rainbow prism of colors of my existing crystal vases and perfume decantors. Returning...also cuz I really didn't need the 6 highball glasses, which had to be purchased. They are sub-par quality.
customer_reviews.author: Don In Southern California

customer_reviews.title: Nice But...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to give to my boss and the set was very nice but the box that it came in was missing an end. Wouldn't have been such a big deal but the box it came in was lined and had Styrofoam under the lining and it went everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. The box and packaging was well put together. I’m very satisfied with the quality and price. I’d recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for out crystal anniversary. We were both impressed by the quality of this glass and the packaging was great too.
customer_reviews.author: CitizenA

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice. However the product arrived with a broken neck (Update)
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice. However the product arrived with a broken neck, on the decanter. I have since returned it, and am purchasing another. A further review will happen when that one is delivered. Update: The new one arrived intact. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Stout

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my bf for Christmas he loved it! Only thing that stopped from being 5 stars are the lil black stickers on the glass my eventually peel off. It has the logo name on it and looks real nice but after a few washes may peel off. Other than that good buy!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: she remarked how beautiful the box and packing were
customer_reviews.text: Wow, when my wife opened the box, she remarked how beautiful the box and packing were. Once we inspected the glassware, we were very impressed. The decanter and glasses far exceeded our expectations. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Craig L. Blume

customer_reviews.title: Love it!🥃
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice decanter set for the money. I love the design, it looks even better in person. I definitely recommend this set to anyone looking for a quality decanter without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Clarke

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what you're paying for
customer_reviews.text: It's not cut crystal, but the top fits perfectly and the glasses have a great weight to them. If you want genuine cut crystal you're gonna have to pay a lot more, but this looks great and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome set well worth the price. There is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Handsome set well worth the price. There is a seam, but to reiterate previous reviews it is cleverly hidden in the design.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Nice and heavy weight. Perfect gift for husband and his new office.
customer_reviews.author: sedaug

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my boss who has a preference for Old Fashions. The packaging was impeccable and the presentation was superb. Great gift at an affordable price that can be presented in any formal dining area.
customer_reviews.author: walterreichold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product....not like cheaply made ones that I have seen that were also more expensive. Super fast delivery as well. Couldn’t be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my twenty-four year old nephew. He was thrilled with it. It seemed to be elegant and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JoBo

customer_reviews.title: Even more classic and attractive in real life
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect. Classic decanter and the glasses are more beautiful than the pics really show. Timeless pieces that are central to our hosting bar. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome...good price
customer_reviews.text: Got this to complement our new corner liquor cabinet...looks great
customer_reviews.author: Erik L

customer_reviews.title: Set was exactly what was pictured  and described !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set ...good quality. Well packaged. Very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Purchased as a gift for my father and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharissa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels like quality. Great decision for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap in appearance and presentation
customer_reviews.text: While the pictures may convey the look of a high-quality product, I was VERY disappointed when my decanter set arrived. The packaging was very nice and high quality. However, the product within was anything but. The glasses felt thin, light, and were made out of very poor quality of glass. I have paid 88 cents for better glassware at Walmart. The surfaces are not smooth and you can see imperfections and, literally, scratches everywhere. This is not crystal by any means. Returning and paying for Mikasa or Waterford.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Reporter

customer_reviews.title: package arrived on time and safe. decanter/topper/cups received w/out ...
customer_reviews.text: package arrived on time and safe. decanter/topper/cups received w/out any issues. Box was handsome and items were well protected and surrounded by silky/polyster cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful, worth the money. My son is going to be so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R Rangel

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful set at a great price! Spend the extra few dollars over the cheap sets sold here and you’ll be happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: HUKIT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set!!! Highly recommended as a gift or personal use.
customer_reviews.author: CDel677

product_meta.title: Miko Crystal Decanter Set With 6 Double Old Fashioned Glasses- Lead Free Crystal (Nairn)
feature_bullets: Enjoy the elegance of the Miko whiskey decanter set in the comfort of your own home. With a beautifully crafted decanter and 6 matching drinking glasses, your favorite liquor will taste and look better than it ever has before. The set is extremely sturdy and durable to last, while maintaining a beautiful and elegant design.
Our glasses are made of lead-free crystal which is super clear and fancy to the eyes of the beholder. The grip and weight of the glasses ensure the quality of the glass.
Compliment your bar with the bountiful curves and slits that make for a classic style that surely feels prestigious. Embrace the craftsmanship that will be noticed by everyone in the room.

This multi-use liquor decanter set can be used for whiskey, scotch, bourbon, cognac, tequila, and many more.. Your decanter with surely be a phenomenal centerpiece for you to enjoy. Perfect for hosting and makes a great gift for that special person.

Packaging is extremely sturdy to prevent breakage and is dishwasher safe. We will work with you to make sure you are fully satisfied with your experience with us. We ensure satisfaction and will work with you through any issues or concerns. Dimensions: Decanter:183mm, Cup:95mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
